name: Dinner Tonight: Chickpea Bruschetta
description: As the summer swelter begins to arrive, I'm sometimes as adverse to cooking dinner as I am to wearing wool socks. There are just some days when actually contributing to the amount of heat in the house seems like absolute...
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons fresh basil leaves, finely shredded.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients together. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Allow to marinate for at least 20 minutes, preferably longer.
Toast the bread or grill it for more dramatic presentation. Spoon mixture on bread, drizzle with olive oil, and serve.
